Posts.Content: Definitely the dexamethasone it gives me a buzz I had a late chemo last time so was awake all night .luckily it's an early one thing time so dexx will be given earlier.
Posts.Title: FEC and sleep

Posts.Content: ive knitted and crochet and sewn a few covers already,also made hats in numerous colours ,i think im ready and now waitng
Posts.Title: picc line's any tips on management,

Posts.Content: its a bit grim when they are trying to get the vein ,im not bothered by needles but my friend who came with me is she was cringing like mad,
Posts.Title: picc line's any tips on management,

Posts.Content: My veins are rubbish so it is a picc line for me.anyone have any tips. Hiding them not going to be fun in this weather is going to be difficult
Posts.Title: picc line's any tips on management,

Posts.Content: Â i had a grade 2 triple negative 22mm lump never felt it ,it was found on routine mammogrami had a lumpectomy in may i was due to start chemo last week fec-t ,but i couldnt they tried 4 times to get a vein ,so now i have to have a picc line on wednesday,thats in my right arm ,i have lympodeama in my left arm so its going to be interesting,im for rads after,
